title: account created
body: im just curious is there away to see the exact date we made our accounts. i was talking with a friend about how long we had been playing and i forgot exactly how long so i was looking for a way to see when i created my account and was unable to find the date.

replies.body: You can see a lot of information on our [**privacy website**](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/), but I'm not entirely sure if that date is part of the information we can provide.
